description:
Provides a Private Zone Record resource.

-> **NOTE:** Terraform will auto Create a Private Zone Record while it uses `alicloud_pvtz_zone_record` to build a Private Zone Record resource.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

Priority.description: The priority of the Private Zone Record. At present, only can "MX" record support it. Valid values: [1-50]. Default to 1.

ResourceRecord.description: The resource record of the Private Zone Record.

Ttl.description: The ttl of the Private Zone Record.

Type.description: The type of the Private Zone Record. Valid values: A, CNAME, TXT, MX, PTR.

Value.description: The value of the Private Zone Record.

ZoneId.description: The name of the Private Zone Record.
